movies.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
movies.plot: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshipper and a drifter named Max.

poster.caption: Charlize Theron and Tom Hardy in Mad Max: Fury Road (2015)

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
movies.originalTitle: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
movies.plot: As a new threat to the galaxy rises, Rey, a desert scavenger, and Finn, an ex-stormtrooper, must join Han Solo and Chewbacca to search for the one hope of restoring peace.

poster.caption: Harrison Ford, Anthony Daniels, Carrie Fisher, Kenny Baker, Michael Giacchino, Peter Mayhew, Nigel Godrich, Oscar Isaac, Brian Herring, Lupita Nyong'o, Dave Chapman, Adam Driver, Gwendoline Christie, John Boyega, and Daisy Ridley in Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens (2015)

movies.title: The Martian
movies.plot: An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars after his team assumes him dead, and must rely on his ingenuity to find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive and can survive until a potential rescue.

poster.caption: Matt Damon in The Martian (2015)

movies.title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
movies.plot: When Tony Stark and Bruce Banner try to jump-start a dormant peacekeeping program called Ultron, things go horribly wrong and it's up to Earth's mightiest heroes to stop the villainous Ultron from enacting his terrible plan.

poster.caption: Samuel L. Jackson, Robert Downey Jr., James Spader, Paul Bettany, Chris Evans, Scarlett Johansson, Elizabeth Olsen, Jeremy Renner, Mark Ruffalo, Aaron Taylor-Johnson, and Chris Hemsworth in Avengers: Age of Ultron (2015)

movies.title: The Revenant
movies.plot: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

poster.caption: Leonardo DiCaprio in The Revenant (2015)

movies.title: Inside Out
movies.plot: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions, Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust, and Sadness, conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.

poster.caption: Lewis Black, Bill Hader, Amy Poehler, Phyllis Smith, and Mindy Kaling in Inside Out (2015)

movies.title: Ant-Man
movies.plot: Armed with a super-suit with the astonishing ability to shrink in scale but increase in strength, cat burglar Scott Lang must embrace his inner hero and help his mentor, Dr. Hank Pym, pull off a plan that will save the world.

poster.caption: Michael Douglas, Bobby Cannavale, Michael Peña, Paul Rudd, Corey Stoll, Mark Knapton, and Evangeline Lilly in Ant-Man (2015)

movies.title: Jurassic World
movies.plot: A new theme park, built on the original site of Jurassic Park, creates a genetically modified hybrid dinosaur, the Indominus Rex, which escapes containment and goes on a killing spree.

poster.caption: Chris Pratt in Jurassic World (2015)

movies.title: The Hateful Eight
movies.plot: In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin currently inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters.

poster.caption: Samuel L. Jackson, Jennifer Jason Leigh, Michael Madsen, Tim Roth, Kurt Russell, Bruce Dern, Demián Bichir, and Walton Goggins in The Hateful Eight (2015)

movies.title: The Big Short
movies.plot: In 2006-2007 a group of investors bet against the United States mortgage market. In their research, they discover how flawed and corrupt the market is.

poster.caption: Brad Pitt, Christian Bale, Steve Carell, and Ryan Gosling in The Big Short (2015)

movies.title: Spotlight
movies.plot: The true story of how the Boston Globe uncovered the massive scandal of child molestation and cover-up within the local Catholic Archdiocese, shaking the entire Catholic Church to its core.

poster.caption: Michael Keaton, Liev Schreiber, Brian d'Arcy James, Mark Ruffalo, and Rachel McAdams in Spotlight (2015)

movies.title: Sicario
movies.plot: An idealistic FBI agent is enlisted by a government task force to aid in the escalating war against drugs at the border area between the U.S. and Mexico.

poster.caption: Josh Brolin, Benicio Del Toro, and Emily Blunt in Sicario (2015)

movies.title: Spectre
movies.plot: A cryptic message from James Bond's past sends him on a trail to uncover the existence of a sinister organisation named SPECTRE. With a new threat dawning, Bond learns the terrible truth about the author of all his pain in his most recent missions.

poster.caption: Daniel Craig in Spectre (2015)

movies.title: Room
movies.plot: A little boy is held captive in a room with his mother since his birth, so he has never known the world outside.

poster.caption: Brie Larson and Jacob Tremblay in Room (2015)

movies.title: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation
movies.plot: Ethan and his team take on their most impossible mission yet when they have to eradicate an international rogue organization as highly skilled as they are and committed to destroying the IMF.

poster.caption: Tom Cruise, Alec Baldwin, Ving Rhames, Rebecca Ferguson, Simon Pegg, and Jeremy Renner in Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation (2015)

movies.title: Furious 7
movies.plot: Deckard Shaw seeks revenge against Dominic Toretto and his family for his comatose brother.

poster.caption: Furious 7 (2015)

movies.title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 2
movies.plot: Katniss and a team of rebels from District 13 prepare for the final battle that will decide the fate of Panem.

poster.caption: Jennifer Lawrence in The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 2 (2015)

movies.title: The Man from U.N.C.L.E.
movies.plot: In the early 1960s, CIA agent Napoleon Solo and KGB operative Illya Kuryakin participate in a joint mission against a mysterious criminal organization, which is working to proliferate nuclear weapons.

poster.caption: Henry Cavill, Armie Hammer, Alicia Vikander, and Elizabeth Debicki in The Man from U.N.C.L.E. (2015)

movies.title: Fifty Shades of Grey
movies.plot: Literature student Anastasia Steele's life changes forever when she meets handsome, yet tormented, billionaire Christian Grey.

poster.caption: Fifty Shades of Grey (2015)

movies.title: The Witch
movies.plot: An isolated Puritan family in 1630s New England comes unraveled by the forces of witchcraft and possession.

poster.caption: The Witch (2015)

movies.title: Bridge of Spies
movies.plot: During the Cold War, an American lawyer is recruited to defend an arrested Soviet spy in court, and then help the CIA facilitate an exchange of the spy for the Soviet captured American U2 spy plane pilot, Francis Gary Powers.

poster.caption: Tom Hanks in Bridge of Spies (2015)

movies.title: Creed
movies.plot: The former World Heavyweight Champion Rocky Balboa serves as a trainer and mentor to Adonis Johnson, the son of his late friend and former rival Apollo Creed.

poster.caption: Sylvester Stallone and Michael B. Jordan in Creed (2015)

movies.title: The Lobster
movies.plot: In a dystopian near future, according to the laws of The City, single people are taken to The Hotel, where they are obliged to find a romantic partner in 45 days or they're transformed into beasts and sent off into The Woods.

poster.caption: Colin Farrell in The Lobster (2015)

movies.title: The Intern
movies.plot: Seventy-year-old widower Ben Whittaker has discovered that retirement isn't all it's cracked up to be. Seizing an opportunity to get back in the game, he becomes a senior intern at an online fashion site, founded and run by Jules Ostin.

poster.caption: Robert De Niro and Anne Hathaway in The Intern (2015)

movies.title: Terminator Genisys
movies.plot: When John Connor, leader of the human resistance, sends Sgt. Kyle Reese back to 1984 to protect Sarah Connor and safeguard the future, an unexpected turn of events creates a fractured timeline.

poster.caption: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Jason Clarke, Jai Courtney, and Emilia Clarke in Terminator Genisys (2015)

movies.title: Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
movies.plot: After having escaped the Maze, the Gladers face a new set of challenges on the open roads of a desolate landscape filled with unimaginable obstacles.

poster.caption: Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials (2015)

movies.title: Focus
movies.plot: In the midst of veteran con man Nicky's latest scheme, a woman from his past - now an accomplished femme fatale - shows up and throws his plans for a loop.

poster.caption: Will Smith and Margot Robbie in Focus (2015)

movies.title: Chappie
movies.plot: In the near future, crime is patrolled by a mechanized police force. When one police droid, Chappie, is stolen and given new programming, he becomes the first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself.

poster.caption: Sharlto Copley in Chappie (2015)

movies.title: Minions
movies.plot: Minions Stuart, Kevin, and Bob are recruited by Scarlet Overkill, a supervillain who, alongside her inventor husband Herb, hatches a plot to take over the world.

poster.caption: Pierre Coffin in Minions (2015)

movies.title: Southpaw
movies.plot: After a fatal incident sends him on a rampant path of destruction, a champion boxer fights to get custody of his daughter and revive his professional career.

poster.caption: Jake Gyllenhaal and Rachel McAdams in Southpaw (2015)

movies.title: San Andreas
movies.plot: In the aftermath of a massive earthquake in California, a rescue-chopper pilot makes a dangerous journey with his ex-wife across the state in order to rescue his daughter.

poster.caption: Dwayne Johnson in San Andreas (2015)

movies.title: Spy
movies.plot: A desk-bound CIA analyst volunteers to go undercover to infiltrate the world of a deadly arms dealer and prevent diabolical global disaster.

poster.caption: Melissa McCarthy in Spy (2015)

movies.title: The Divergent Series: Insurgent
movies.plot: Tris Prior must confront her inner demons, and with help from those closest to her, continue the fight against a powerful alliance that threatens to tear her society apart.

poster.caption: Shailene Woodley and Theo James in The Divergent Series: Insurgent (2015)

movies.title: Ted 2
movies.plot: Newlywed couple Ted and Tami-Lynn want to have a baby, but in order to qualify to be a parent, Ted will have to prove he's a person in a court of law.

poster.caption: Mark Wahlberg and Seth MacFarlane in Ted 2 (2015)

movies.title: Everest
movies.plot: On May 10, 1996, mountain guides Rob Hall and Scott Fischer combine their expedition teams for a final ascent to the summit of Mount Everest. With little warning, a storm strikes the mountain and the climbers must now battle to survive.

poster.caption: Everest (2015)

movies.title: Straight Outta Compton
movies.plot: The rap group NWA emerges from the mean streets of Compton in the mid-1980s and revolutionizes hip-hop culture with their music and tales about life in the hood.

poster.caption: Neil Brown Jr., Aldis Hodge, Corey Hawkins, Jason Mitchell, and O'Shea Jackson Jr. in Straight Outta Compton (2015)

movies.title: The Age of Adaline
movies.plot: An ageless woman meets someone who reawakens her passion for life and romance.

poster.caption: Michiel Huisman and Blake Lively in The Age of Adaline (2015)

movies.title: Legend
movies.plot: Identical twin gangsters Ronald and Reginald Kray terrorize London during the 1960s.

poster.caption: Emily Browning and Tom Hardy in Legend (2015)

movies.title: The Danish Girl
movies.plot: A love story loosely inspired by the lives of Danish artists Lili Elbe and Gerda Wegener. Lili and Gerda's marriage and work evolve as they navigate Lili's groundbreaking journey as a transgender pioneer.

poster.caption: Eddie Redmayne and Alicia Vikander in The Danish Girl (2015)

movies.title: Cinderella
movies.plot: When her father unexpectedly dies, young Ella finds herself at the mercy of her cruel stepmother and her scheming stepsisters. Never one to give up hope, Ella's fortunes begin to change after meeting a dashing stranger.

poster.caption: Lily James in Cinderella (2015)

movies.title: Black Mass
movies.plot: The true story of Whitey Bulger, the brother of a state senator and the most infamous violent criminal in the history of South Boston, who became an FBI informant to take down a Mafia family invading his turf.

poster.caption: Kevin Bacon, Johnny Depp, Joel Edgerton, Dakota Johnson, Jesse Plemons, Peter Sarsgaard, Corey Stoll, and Benedict Cumberbatch in Black Mass (2015)

movies.title: Jupiter Ascending
movies.plot: A genetically engineered soldier informs a young woman of her extraordinary destiny.

poster.caption: Mila Kunis and Channing Tatum in Jupiter Ascending (2015)

movies.title: Tomorrowland
movies.plot: Bound by a shared destiny, a teen bursting with scientific curiosity and a former boy-genius inventor embark on a mission to unearth the secrets of a place somewhere in time and space that exists in their collective memory.

poster.caption: George Clooney and Thomas Robinson in Tomorrowland (2015)

movies.title: Fantastic Four
movies.plot: Four young outsiders teleport to an alternate and dangerous universe which alters their physical form in shocking ways. The four must learn to harness their new abilities and work together to save Earth from a former friend turned enemy.

poster.caption: Jamie Bell, Michael B. Jordan, Kate Mara, and Miles Teller in Fantastic Four (2015)

movies.title: Steve Jobs
movies.plot: Steve Jobs takes us behind the scenes of the digital revolution, to paint a portrait of the man at its epicenter. The story unfolds backstage at three iconic product launches, ending in 1998 with the unveiling of the iMac.

poster.caption: Michael Fassbender in Steve Jobs (2015)

movies.title: The Gift
movies.plot: A married couple, Simon and Robyn, run into Gordo, an old classmate. Things take a turn when Gordo begins to drop in unannounced at their house and inundates them with mysterious gifts.

poster.caption: Joel Edgerton in The Gift (2015)

movies.title: Pitch Perfect 2
movies.plot: After a humiliating command performance at The Kennedy Center, the Barden Bellas enter an international competition that no American group has ever won in order to regain their status and right to perform.

poster.caption: Anna Kendrick, Rebel Wilson, Anna Camp, Hana Mae Lee, Chrissie Fit, Hailee Steinfeld, Alexis Knapp, and Ester Dean in Pitch Perfect 2 (2015)

movies.title: Pixels
movies.plot: When aliens misinterpret video feeds of classic arcade games as a declaration of war, they attack the Earth in the form of the video games.

poster.caption: Adam Sandler, Peter Dinklage, Kevin James, Michelle Monaghan, and Josh Gad in Pixels (2015)

movies.title: The Visit
movies.plot: Two siblings become increasingly frightened by their grandparents' disturbing behavior while visiting them on vacation.

poster.caption: The Visit (2015)

movies.title: Crimson Peak
movies.plot: A new bride investigates ghostly visions at a remote gothic mansion that holds dark secrets.

poster.caption: Mia Wasikowska in Crimson Peak (2015)
